Text:
how to generate the key in keygen >?
wht is software's about box ?
Has anyone tried this, is this working without the ad line ?? Sent Via SMSCaster ??

Thnx buddy,works perfectly here

To Register do this:

1)Open KeyGen
2)Open the software's main Window then on the upper panel (menu) "Click" on "Help then About" and another window will open (About window) copy the "Serial #" onto the Keygen and click on "Generate"
3)When the key is generated then go to "Help>Enter Unlock Key" then paste the generated serial/Key there and now the software would be registered..

And this has come up perfectly clean with my AVG n MBAM,thnx again Chami1988..
